abstract: Exxon Mobil chief Rex W Tillerson tells investors that his expectation is that oil prices will remain low for two years because of current supplies and weak economic growth.
lead_paragraph: The chief of Exxon Mobil, Rex W. Tillerson, cautioned that geopolitical turmoil could unexpectedly send prices higher, but he said much more oil was ready to reach the market.

headline.main: Exxon Chief Expects Oil Prices to Stay Low for 2 Years
headline.print_headline: Exxon Chief Expects Oil Prices to Stay Low for 2 Years
